title: gt_addict
author: gt_addict
created_time: December 02, 2023, 02:09:07 PMLast edit: December 30, 2023, 01:09:10 PM by gt_addict
content: Found this on ebay and thought I would bring peoples attention to it. Being part of the forum and owning genuine gekkoscience products I haven’t heard of anything of the sort from sidehack and the team. Just a headsup that its using the gekkoscience brand to mislead people into thinking its their product. https://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/196106676967?mkcid=16&mkevt=1&mkrid=711-127632-2357-0&ssspo=3ndlbsq8tu-&sssrc=4429486&ssuid=m7NV-5oRR3q&var=&widget_ver=artemis&media=COPY

comments.author: kano
comments.body: Yes he's mentioned it with similar images in my pool #gekko channel not long ago.Gekko distributors should have them ... or soon.Avoid scalpers on ebay.In sidehacks words:QuoteGekkoScience just announced a new product.It's a powered USB hub with a Pi Zero 2 W, ethernet and OLED screen built in.9 ports up top with room for snap-on fans. Full web config.We're also making splitters so you can power a snap-on fan from the same port as the stick.Works for USB and 2/3/4-wire 5V fans.

comments.author: sidehack
comments.body: I'm working on the official announcement post, but yes it's a real product. The listing is legit; in fact, I'm sitting next to the guy who put it up. He's a newly minted reseller for UK and will have stock in hand in a few days.

comments.author: gt_addict
comments.body: Oh wow. Then my apologies to the guy then as I thought it was just another scam artist trying to capitalise on your brand. I’m very intrigued to say the least seeing as its genuine. Is the link I posted the new UK reseller?

comments.author: IAmGPIO
comments.body: Quote from: gt_addict on December 03, 2023, 10:00:09 AMOh wow. Then my apologies to the guy then as I thought it was just another scam artist trying to capitalise on your brand. I’m very intrigued to say the least seeing as its genuine. Is the link I posted the new UK reseller?Hey, apology accepted! It was a fair assumption to make and I appreciate you looking out for people and Sidehack's brand. So I've been a long time lurker, first time poster here on the forum. Been involved with BTC since 2011 and a good friend of Sidehack for a while. As mentioned, a formal announcement is coming on the SmartHub. The site plastered on the eBay listing you posted is mine. (www.thesolomining.co)Cheers!IAmGpio
